ygData.subject: RE: Brian, why better ac for rogues, bards, and ra ngers?
ygData.msgSnippet: As a quick note on the BP at least.. I really don t buy the stats for it, I can t see Verant giving us two pieces with nearly identical bonuses (Sta and MR in
ygData.messageBody:
As a quick note on the BP at least.. I really don't buy the stats for it, I
can't see Verant giving us two pieces with nearly identical bonuses (Sta and
MR in this case), I really hope this is not the case.

Personally with the stats as they stand now, I'm sticking with my Charred BP
(16AC, +3STR, +6 STA), at least until I can get a Dark Flame BP.

I know they mentioned that this armor is obviously not the best armor we can
get (Umbral for now). I feel for what is required to obtain it though, we
should at least have decent stats (I still like the stats on the bracers,
just not the red color). The majority of components needed can not be
obtained without a well balanced full 30+ group (I would go so far as to say
high 30's). This reward should be equal to the effort and in this case I
don't feel it is.

Enjoy..






-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 11:24 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Brian, why better ac for rogues, bards, and
rangers?


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

I don't understand why the chain based armor of the rangers has a
higher AC than our darkforge armor, and arguably better statistics.
All of the ranger armor I've seen has excellent bonuses to pertinent
stats. Example.

Ivy etched tunic (ranger): 19AC +3Str +3Wis +30HP
Darkforge breastplate (sk): 18AC +10Sta +3Mr

I don't know exactly how stamina works, but I know that the +6 stamina
on my charred bp equates to about 13HP for me at level 33.

The leggings...
Lambent greaves (bard): 13AC +1Cha +5Agi weight 4.0
Darkforge greaves(sk): 11AC +9Sta +3Mr weight 7
Ivy Etched greaves(rng): 12AC +5Agi +5Fire +5Cold

Bard: 2 AC more and weighs 3lbs less. Also, the Agi bonus will give
another point or two of ac.

Ranger: 1 more AC

I hear they are upping the crusader spawns, which is good, but
really why do the rangers have higher ac on their chain armor? It
doesn't make sense.

Xilith

-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
